device.name: Device
device.IsOpenGenlock: Do you want to enable Genclock?
device.IsCloseGenlock: Do you want to disable Genclock?
device.UrlNotValid: Invalid URL. Please enter a new one.
device.UrlOrIpNotValid: The IP address and URL do not match. Please retry.
device.TwoIpConflict: The IP addresses of Ethernet port 1 and 2 conflict. Please retry.
device.URLRules1: 1. The protocol must be ws format and the port number range is 8000–60000.The port number of the monitor URL cannot be the same as that of the echo URL.
device.URLRules2: 2. The IP address in URL must be the same as that of Ethernet port 1 or 2.
device.PortTip: The port number of the monitor URL cannot be the same as that of the echo URL.
device.InterfaceIsUsedTip: Cannot perform this operation because the current input connector is already used.
device.InterfaceIsUsedToolTip: The current input connector is already used.
device.CheckTip: 1.The test will cause transient abnormal display of output.
device.CheckTip1: 2.The system will restart automatically after you close the test result.
device.CheckTip3: The system will restart automatically after you close the test result.

EDID.OutputIsUsed: One or more outputs are in use. Are you sure you want to change the resolution(s)?

EDID.SameInterfaceTip: Only simultaneous setting of interfaces of the same type is supported.
EDID.ExportTip: You cannot export the EDIDs of multiple input or output sources simultaneously. Please select one only.

IPC.BeingUsedSignal: The signal source is being used and cannot be deleted.

About.DeviceIconTip2: 2. The icon is used on the device About Us page and Home page.
